headline: Loco Moco
name: Loco Moco
description: This hearty Hawaiian-style breakfast is quick to make. Rice is served with eggs and fried Spam™, topped with hot brown gravy.
recipeIngredient: 0.5 (12 ounce) container Spam™ sliced into 1/4 inch thick slices

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the rice and water in a saucepan and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 15 minutes or until rice is tender and water is absorbed.

Meanwhile, heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat until hot. Fry Spam™ slices until browned. Remove from the skillet, and set aside. Pour the eggs into the skillet; cook and stir until scrambled and cooked through. Set aside.
For each plate, place two scoops of rice, two scrambled eggs, and two slices of spam. Top with brown gravy.
